name: UnHax Mode - Access

civilopediaText.text: The gateway of UnHax, it allows every players, AI included, to access the extreme amount of cheats that cannot be accessed immediately.

Direct access to the Base building has been removed as of v1.18. You can obtain the cheats by adopting the Legalism social policy, provided there are no other 'cultural' buildings (buildings that provide Culture, and are not wonders) available for construction.

uniques: Provides a [UnHax Mode - Base] in your first [1] cities for free
Destroyed when the city is captured
Triggers a global alert upon completion
Cannot be bought
Unsellable

name: UnHax Mode - Base

civilopediaText.text: The main building; it provides all stats except Faith, unit XP, great person points, unit promotions, and specialist slots in large quantities. Limited to capital city, cannot be sold, destroyed when capital falls.

uniques: [3] free [Founder] units appear
[+9] population [in this city]
[+10000 Culture] [in all cities]
[+777 Science] [in all cities]
[+690 Production] [in all cities]
[+420 Food] [in all cities]
[+42000 Gold] [in all cities]
[+690 Happiness] [in all cities]
May buy [UnHax Mode - Military] buildings for [0] [Gold] [in all cities]
May buy [UnHax Mode - Access] buildings for [0] [Gold] [in all cities]
May buy [UnHax Mode - Monotheistic Religion] buildings for [0] [Gold] [in all cities]
May buy [UnHax Mode - Polytheistic Religion] buildings for [0] [Gold] [in all cities]
May buy [UnHax Mode - Enhancement] buildings for [0] [Gold] [in all cities]
May buy [Founder] units for [10000000] [Gold] [in all cities]
All newly-trained [{non-air} {Military}] units [in this city] receive the [Home Sweet Home] promotion
All newly-trained [{Fighter} {Military}] units [in this city] receive the [Home Sweet Home] promotion
All newly-trained [{Bomber} {Military}] units [in this city] receive the [Home Sweet Home] promotion
New [Military] units start with [420] Experience [in all cities]
Damage is ignored when determining unit Strength <for [All] units>
All units move through Forest and Jungle Tiles in friendly territory as if they have roads. These tiles can be used to establish City Connections upon researching the Wheel.
Provides a [UnHax Mode - Military] in your first [5] cities for free
[{Fighter} {Military}] units gain the [Rejuvenation] promotion
[{Bomber} {Military}] units gain the [Rejuvenation] promotion
[Civilian] units gain the [Civilian Assistance] promotion
[{Land} {Civilian}] units gain the [Enhanced Vision] promotion
[{Water} {Civilian}] units gain the [Better Wayfinding] promotion
Destroyed when the city is captured
Triggers a global alert upon completion
Unsellable
Unbuildable

name: UnHax Mode - Polytheistic Religion

civilopediaText.text: A building for religion-enabled games, generating Faith and allowing immediate founding and enhancing of religions. Similar limitations to the main building, but unbuildable, can be bought once the base is built.
Polytheistic variant; provides bonuses similar to the pre-v1.10 Religion building.

uniques: [2] free [Great Prophet] units appear
May choose [2] additional [Pantheon] beliefs when [founding] a religion
May choose [2] additional [Follower] beliefs when [enhancing] a religion
May choose [2] additional [Enhancer] beliefs when [enhancing] a religion
May not generate great prophet equivalents naturally
May buy [Great Prophet] units for [100] [Faith] [at increasing price (50)]
May buy [Great Scientist] units for [100] [Faith] [at increasing price (50)]
May buy [Great Artist] units for [100] [Faith] [at increasing price (50)]
May buy [Great Merchant] units for [100] [Faith] [at increasing price (50)]
May buy [Great Engineer] units for [100] [Faith] [at increasing price (50)]
May buy [Great General] units for [100] [Faith] [at increasing price (50)]
May buy [Great Spacefarer] units for [100] [Faith] [at increasing price (50)]
[Faith] cost of purchasing [Civilian] units [-75]%
[+1000 Faith] [in all cities]
Only available <in cities without a [UnHax Mode - Monotheistic Religion]>
Hidden when religion is disabled
Destroyed when the city is captured
Unbuildable
Unsellable

name: UnHax Mode - Monotheistic Religion

civilopediaText.text: A building for religion-enabled games, generating Faith massively, allows for founding/enhancing religions. Similar to the Polytheistic variant but provides different belief slots.
Monotheistic variant; provides different additional beliefs than the Polytheistic version.

name: UnHax Mode - Military

civilopediaText.text: A military-oriented building providing free promotions, increased city strength and city health. Can be built on all cities by buying it with Gold after the base is built.

uniques: New [Military] units start with [420] Experience [in this city]
No movement cost to pillage <for [Melee] units>
Great General provides double combat bonus
[200]% XP gained from combat <for [Military] units>

name: UnHax Mode - Enhancement

civilopediaText.text: A building with assorted bonuses to strengthen Military, Religion, and main buildings bonuses. No religious restrictions required.
